SEARCH
Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, ItemListener, MouseListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContentPaneController, FlowChartController
public abstract class Controller extends Object implements ActionListener, ItemListener, MouseListener

This class is the parent class of all the controllers used in this program such as ContentPaneController and FlowChartController

It implements ActionListener, ItemListener and MouseListener

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(AlgorithmExecuter ALGORITHM_EXECUTER, Timer TIMER, Buffer buffer, MemoryStorage MEMORY)

      The constructor method of the Controller class

      Creates an instance of Controller

      Parameters:
      ALGORITHM_EXECUTER - The AlgorithmExecuter instance that executes all the different components
      TIMER - The Timer instance that will coordinate the execution and handles the delay between all the exections
      buffer - The Buffer instance that handles all the outputs from the execution process
      MEMORY - The MemoryStorage that handles all the variables and components informations
